prod_descrip: Hand-screened linen/cotton fabric printed in the USA with earth-friendly, water-based inks
prod_specs:
WIDTH: 54\"REPEAT: V4\" H4\"

HAND-PRINTED

MADE IN THE USA
prod_t_1:
Acco 22 -
The Acco 22 pattern was inspired by one of Kyra\'s most treasured possessions, colorful acrylic cubes that belonged to her grandmother, Weezie. We love the airy geometry of lines and the negative spaces between them. The fabric is a micro-version of our Acco 22 wallpaper - making for a playful coordinate.
prod_t_4: Home Decor Buyer Magazine Wallpaper News Magazine
prod_t_5:
Want to change the colors of this fabric? Or print on another ground option?

All twenty2 fabrics can be easily customized. Learn more.
prod_t_6: Our fabrics are hand-printed on natural linen and cotton grounds with eco-friendly water-based inks. We recommend dry cleaning only.
prod_t_7:
INSTOCK ITEMS
Your order will ship within 1-2 business days if your item is in stock. The ship date may vary based upon availability of each item.

NOT IN STOCK ITEMS
The lead time for any product will be listed right above the price when you are viewing a specific product.

MEMO SAMPLES
Memo sample orders are shipped via the US Postal Service unless otherwise specified during checkout.

RETURNS
As our products are made by hand and are manufactured and sold from specific dye lots, we cannot accept returns. We strongly suggest ordering memo samples to review the color and quality in person before ordering. Once you receive your order, please carefully inspect your product to ensure that it is in good condition and in the quantity you ordered.
